label: 大学寮
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Bureau (ryō) under the Ministry of Ceremonial (Shikibushō). In charge of the Court University (Daigaku), its Professors (Hakase), students, their education, ceremonies in honor of Confucius, etc. [寮、式部省、大学、博士]
